data.event: He died in January 2008, one of at least three soldiers killed while showering since the invasion of Iraq in 2003.

event.title: found many of the facilities that fall

data.event: Task Force SAFE inspectors found many of the facilities that fall under KBR’s contract have electrical problems, according to an internal military document obtained by The Associated Press.
